item.title: Report X-2024070987
item.description:
Report X-2024070987

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-17T18:15:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-11
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE UNLOAD THE MANAGER NOTICED THAT THE METAL PAIL HAD A DENT BASICALLY ON THE TOP EDGE WHICH WAS CAUSING LIQUID TO LEAK FROM THE PAIL. MANAGER IMMEDIATELY TOOK THE PAIL TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE AND VENTILATE IT PROPERLY. I WAS THEN CALLED OVER TO REPACK IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM IN A TIMELY AND SAFE MANNER. APPROXIMATELY 1 LITER LEAKED FROM THE TOP CLOSURE DUE TO A DENT AND PUNCTURE AT THE TOP. WAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH NOW.

UPON INSPECTION OF INNER CONTENTS DURING THE TWILIGHT SHIFT ZEP ZEP CONCENTRATED CALCIUM, LIME & RUST STAIN REMOVER, 4 X 1 GALLON WITH A LOOSE CAPS AND CAUSED LEAKAGING ALLOWING SPILLAGE. item.title: Report E-2024070293
item.description:
Report E-2024070293

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-05
  • City: W CALDWELL
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Pitt Ohio
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon arrival at the destination, the drum was discovered to be dented and leaking slowly. The drum was immediately turned on it's side to prevent further release until it could be overpacked and contained. The investigation revealed that the drum may have been dented as it was being loaded at the destination terminal. Due to the hazard of material, the packaging specifications were not able to be safely obtained.

item.title: Report X-2024070809
item.description:
Report X-2024070809

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-15T18:15:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-28
  • City: KEASBEY

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PKG WAS BROUGHT TO THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEKAGE. UPON INSPECTION TWO BOTTLES OF ZEP INDUSTRIAL PURPLE DEGREASER WAS FOUND TO BE 1/2 WAY LEAKED OUT CAUSE FROM THE CAPS BEING LOOSE. THE CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO BE SCRAPPED UNLESS OTHERWISE.

item.title: Report X-2024070913
item.description:
Report X-2024070913

  • City: PARSIPPANY

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY THREE KILOGRAMS OF DRY ICE COOLING COOKIES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED AIR SERVICE. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024070736
item.description:
Report X-2024070736

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-12T15:12:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-09
  • City: BARRINGTON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING THE UNLOAD THE MANAGER NOTICED THAT THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING AND ALSO WAS WET ALL OVER THE BOTTOM OF THE PACKAGE. IT WAS IMMEDIATELY TAKEN OVER TO THE HAZMAT CAGE TO SECURE IT AND VENTILATE IT. I WAS THEN CALLED OVER TO REPACK IT INTO A YELLOW SALVAGE DRUM IN A TIMELY AND SAFE MANNER. APPROXIMATELY 10 LITERS LEAKED OUT ALTOGETHER FROM THE 4 BOTTLES ON THE INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. ONE BOTTLE HAS A PUNCTURE AND THE OTHER 3 BOTTLES HAD LOOSE CAPS WHICH IS WHY IT WAS LEAKING IN THE FIRST PLACE. WAITING FOR THE DISPOSITION FROM PGH NOW.
